security_risks.description: Authentication is missing for a profile endpoint that may contain sensitive user data.
security_risks.Potential_attack_scenario: An attacker could access or modify user profile information without authentication.

HITECH.reason: This endpoint relates to user profiles, which can contain Protected Health Information (PHI) and requires appropriate security measures.

security_risks.description: Authentication is missing for a registration endpoint that handles sensitive user data.
security_risks.Potential_attack_scenario: An attacker could potentially register malicious accounts or gain unauthorized access to user data during registration.

HITECH.reason: Registration endpoints collect user data that may fall under HITECH regulations if it relates to healthcare services.
